item.title: Elasticsearch Typeahead 101
item.description: In this article, we will talk about talk about how to Elasticsearch Typeahead (Auto-complete) 101 with the Thai Language To start off, we often come across those scaling hurdles as a startup when things are going well and users are actually adopting the product that we built. The hurdles always pop up and slow us down in the second year because we tend to build fast to get fast feedback and pivot even faster in the early days.
